messages.title: Only Tony Miklinski will stand firm against a second referendum.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tony Miklinski will stand firm against a second referendum.
A resolute, capable leader with experience in handling Brexit negotiations to achieve the best for Britain.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Many Unionists in North East Fife chose to vote tactically last time.

issues.brexitEurope: A resolute, capable leader with experience in handling complex negotiations to achieve the best for Britain. You have a choice: a chaotic coalition of Tim Farron, Nicola Sturgeon and Jeremy Corbyn; or Theresa May.

community.content: The SNP would dismantle our precious Union, leaving Scotland hopelessly divided, isolated and stony broke for generations to come. In North East Fife, you get who you vote for, and the Lib Dems haven’t earned it.

leaflet.personalStatement: Born and raised in Dundee, joined the Royal Navy, served in NATO HQ, MOD, Dundee's Defence Director of Training and Education, elected as Councillor for Cupar Ward.

politicalExperience.role: Served in NATO HQ and MOD

contactInformation.address: Haig House, Balgonie Road, Markinch, Fife KY7 6AQ

images.caption: Tony with Mid Scotland and Fife MSP Murdo Fraser

examples: In North East Fife, you get who you vote for, and the Lib Dems haven’t earned it.
Many Unionists in North East Fife chose to vote tactically last time.
Tony Miklinski will stand firm against a second referendum.
The SNP would dismantle our precious Union, leaving Scotland hopelessly divided, isolated and stony broke for generations to come.
A resolute, capable leader with experience in handling complex negotiations to achieve the best for Britain.
You have a choice: a chaotic coalition of Tim Farron, Nicola Sturgeon and Jeremy Corbyn; or Theresa May.
